I think the quality of Alive 2007 is slightly better than Coachella 2006. But thats because the Coachella bootleg was recorded straight from the mixers.

If you want to compare, download the single of Alive 2007 Harder Better Faster Stronger (radio edit). The quality is the same of this release.

If you want the ultimate sound quality, listen to the Kraftwerk live album, Minimum Maximum. Those man are good.
